casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
v.
WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CLAPPER) Petition of: Shane Clapper No. 373 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
